verbs.description: [ARG0: asian world film festival] [V: casts] [ARG1: spotlight] [ARG2: on world cinema most dynamic region asian world film festival] casts spotlight on world cinema most dynamic region awkwafina steven yeun georges n chamchoum burning cannes palme david womack jeon chyngyz aitmatov southern california film soviet union yoo hfpa the last emperor asia slumdog millionaire lisa lu hollywood mark duplass calif lifetime achievement award africa sonia hollywood foreign press assn oscar u s india snow leopard trust joy luck club director arclight cinemas the girl with the red scarf executive director anupam kher azad hind emile hirsch motion picture academy south korea freida pinto richa chadda culver city ben crystal yifei tokyo mrunal thakur official awff golden globes china chang - dong lee bille august demi moore tabrez noorani
